report.title: A Novel Treat
report.author: CalmAnDaring
report.bodytext: Background: Healthy. Tried many substances but never binged or used habitually. /n /n Set: Home with 1 friend. /n Setting: Eaten a small meal 1 hr prior. A stressful 4 weeks had gone by, and I had received some MDAI as a white crystalline powder. The week before a friend and I tried 5mg, then a few hours later 40mg to determine whether we thought it was actually MDAI and it's purity. We subtlety noticed 'something nice,' and concluded it was probably high quality. /n /n 8:00PM /n Dose taken with water /n /n 8:20PM /n Stomach feels a bit like ingestion, heart beat up a little. /n More awake, possibly just music and relaxing. Clammy hands. /n /n 8:25PM /n Notice subtle headspace change. Fluffy, floaty. /n /n 8:30PM /n Not that jaw is clenching yet, but chewy sounds good. /n Feels nice to move and stretch. /n /n 8:40PM /n Chose chewy that tastes putrid, 'rotten berry flavour' . Spat it out. /n 'Need to poop feeling' but I know I don't need to. /n Body temp must be up, sweaty 'pits'. /n Pupil Dilation /n Feeling mood lift and nice body high coming in waves. /n /n 9PM /n Definetley feeling nice. Desire to move about. /n Getting harder to write, concentration not as good. /n Enhanced colours, music is enveloping me. /n Still want to poo. /n /n 9:30PM /n Keep thinking about getting comfortable on couch but keep getting distracted. /n Hot and cold waves. Sweating with jumpers on but want a heater. (I get this on MDMA and 2ci also) /n /n 9:50PM /n Put a heater on, bit more comfortable. Making sure to drink water. /n Music is hard to chose, no particular genre' sounds good, just particular songs. /n I STILL WANT TO POO! I think my bowels must be relaxed. /n /n 10:10PM /n Had a water pipe hit of THC, got chills and prickly fingers. Very nice. /n Conversation is deep, but not serious. Laughter feels good. /n /n 10:20 /n Some slight jaw tension. Want chewy but don't want the disgusting berry one. /n /n 10:45 /n Starting to mellow just a little. /n Debating a little more. /n 50mg oral?.'woops I did'. /n /n 11:20 /n Feeling the 50mg. It doesn't bring me up in any way just sustains the buzz. /n /n 2:30 /n Finished watching watchmen. Still feeling awake /n Talk to friend. /n /n 4PM /n Fell asleep /n /n Conclusion: /n I used MDMA 3 times, 4 years ago but for comparison It felt somewhat reminiscent. /n Unlike MDMA though, there is no 'blast off' like something starts and ends. /n Mentally it feels mellow and very non-toxic, although a definite mood lift and desire to socialise. /n /n Although it's somewhat sedating, I wasn't able to fall asleep easily. Thankfully a solid 8 hour sleep followed. The next day there was no real hangover. Maybe a little tired if anything. /n /n A novel treat*
